p:
5. Sheng Zhang, et al
62
This study concerned the impact of COVID‐19 on the Diamond Princess cruise ship.
The study showed that the maximum‐likelihood (ML) value of basic reproductive number (
R 0 ) was 2.28 at an early stage on the ship for the COVID‐19 outbreak.
It was shown that if (
R 0 ) value was reduced by 25% and 50%, the estimated total number of cumulative cases would be reduced from 1514 (1384‐1656) to 1081 (981‐1177) and 758 (697‐817) as of February 26, 2020, respectively.
